thread.title: Live score: India v Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4
thread.title_full: Live score: India v Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4

title: Live score: India v Australia, 3rd Test, Day 4
text: For more detailed analysis follow Cricbuzz's match home here Pat Cummins once again was the standout bowler for Australia. He bowled with a lot of fire and bagged the prized scalps of Virat Kohli and Ajinkya Rahane. The other Aussie bowlers fared decently but were not threatening. Their spinners were disappointing as they failed to get much purchase from the track. The morning session tomorrow will be crucial for both teams and it will decide which way this Test match will head. Do join us at 0930 local (0400 GMT) to catch all the action. Cheers! At the end of the third day of this Test match, Australia find themselves ahead of India by 91 runs. We witnessed a cracking day of Test cricket. The hosts batted superbly in the first session but a brainfade from Murali Vijay right at the stroke of lunch saw him getting stumped. The middle order comprised of Virat Kohli, Ajinkya Rahane and Karun Nair failed to deliver and India were in a spot of bother. However, Cheteshwar Pujara and Wriddhiman Saha steadied the ship a bit towards the end to keep the game in balance. Cheteshwar Pujara hugs his partner as he starts to walk to the pavilion. Good gesture shown by the Australian players as they go up to congratulate Pujara. It's been a monumental knock from India's number 3 as he held one end tightly whole day. 129.6 OVERS India: 360/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Angles in a full ball on off, Saha defends it safely and that will be stumps on day 3! 129.5 OVERS India: 360/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Once again Hazlewood keeps his length full and lands it around middle and off, Saha defends it from the back foot. 129.4 OVERS India: 360/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Too full and around off, Saha gets forward and pushes it off the inner half of the bat to short mid-wicket. 129.3 OVERS India: 360/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Bouncer around middle and leg, Saha ducks underneath it. 129.2 OVERS India: 360/6 J Hazlewood to W Saha, An overpitched ball on off, Saha gets on the front foot and pushes it straight to mid off. 129.1 OVERS India: 360/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Fullish and around off, Saha lunges and defends it back to the bowler. Last over of the day coming up... 128.6 OVERS India: 360/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Flighted and outside off, turning away a bit, Pujara pads it away towards first slip. 128.5 OVERS India: 360/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Slows it in the air and serves a full flighted ball on off, 76 kph, Pujara gets forward in defense. 128.4 OVERS India: 360/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Flatter full ball on off, pushed in the gap at covers for a quick single. 128.3 OVERS India: 359/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Loopy and around off, Saha watches the line closely and lets it through to the keeper. 128.2 OVERS India: 359/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Tossed up ball on off, defended off the front foot. 128.1 OVERS India: 359/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, FOUR! Brilliant shot! SOK fires a full ball down the leg side, Saha kneels and nails his paddle sweep fine down the leg side for a boundary. 127.6 OVERS India: 355/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Saha has played it to the point region. One run added to the total. 127.5 OVERS India: 354/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Sliding down the leg side, it's nudged through backward square leg for a single. 127.4 OVERS India: 353/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Goes full again, around off, Pujara gets behind the line with a vertical bat and defends it back. 127.3 OVERS India: 353/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Bouncer around off, Pujara ducks underneath it. 127.2 OVERS India: 353/6 J Hazlewood to C Pujara, Bowls it from wide of the crease and darts in a full ball on middle, Pujara gets behind the line and pushes it towards mid on. 127.1 OVERS India: 353/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Angles in a full ball on off, Pujara draws forward, gets behind the line and defends it back. 126.6 OVERS India: 353/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Returns to over the wicket and serves a flighted ball outside leg, Saha offers no shot and pads it away. 126.5 OVERS India: 353/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Slow loopy ball on middle, fuller in length, Saha is forward in defense. 126.4 OVERS India: 353/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Defended off the front foot by the batsman presenting the full face of the bat. 126.3 OVERS India: 353/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Quicker full ball on off, 91 kph, Saha defends it off his front foot to the off side. 126.2 OVERS India: 353/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, A little short and around off, Che gets back and turns it behind square leg for one. 126.1 OVERS India: 352/6 S O'Keefe to Saha, Arm ball landing around off, Saha gets back and punches it down to long off for a run. Deficit for India is under 100 now. 125.6 OVERS India: 351/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Fullish and just around off, Saha opens the face of the bat and pushes it through cover-point for a single. 125.5 OVERS India: 350/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Fuller and on off, angling in, Wriddhiman drives it with good timing to mid off. 125.4 OVERS India: 350/6 J Hazlewood to C Pujara, Short of a length ball on off, angling in, Pujara pulls it through square leg and takes a run. 125.3 OVERS India: 349/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Fine shot! Full and tailing back into the batsman from around off, Pujara quietly flicks it through the gap between two mid-wicket fielders for a couple of runs. 125.2 OVERS India: 347/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Bowls it fuller and on off, Pujara drives off his front foot to mid off. 125.1 OVERS India: 347/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Good length ball outside off, Saha runs it down to third man for a run. 124.6 OVERS India: 346/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Fires in a quicker one on middle and leg, Pujara tries to work on the leg side but misses. 124.5 OVERS India: 346/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Too full in length on off, Pujara sticks back and pushes it to mid off. 124.4 OVERS India: 346/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Arm ball around off, fuller in length, pushed to covers. 124.3 OVERS India: 346/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Floated ball on off, Che gets forward in defense. 124.2 OVERS India: 346/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Play and a miss! Flatter and a touch shorter on off, straightening a touch, Pujara tries to cut but misses. 124.1 OVERS India: 346/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Too full in length on middle, pushed down to mid on. 123.6 OVERS India: 346/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Bouncer around off, Saha drops his wrists and ducks underneath it immediately. 123.5 OVERS India: 346/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Fullish and outside off, Saha pushes it off his front foot to short cover. 123.4 OVERS India: 346/6 J Hazlewood to Saha, Big movement back into the batsman from a length outside off, Saha is hurried up, tries to keep it out but misses and is hit on the thigh pad. 123.3 OVERS India: 346/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Lands it very full and outside off, Pujara drives it easily through covers for a run. 123.2 OVERS India: 345/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Bowls it way wide outside off, an easy leave for Pujara. 123.1 OVERS India: 345/6 J Hazlewood to Pujara, Defended off the front foot by the batsman presenting the full face of the bat. 122.6 OVERS India: 345/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Fires in a quicker one on middle, it's helped to mid-wicket for one. 122.5 OVERS India: 344/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Turning away from the batsman outside off, Pujara has nothing to do with it. 122.4 OVERS India: 344/6 S O'Keefe to Pujara, Flatter and on off, defended from the back foot. 122.3 OVERS India: 344/6
